snippet: The Tanglewood Music Center’s Festival of Contemporary Music offered six programs with a small group of composers who interested this year’s festival director, the composer Oliver Knussen.
abstract: Allan Kozinn gives examples of the unexpected programming at the Tanglewood Music Center’s Festival of Contemporary Music in Lenox, Mass.
lead_paragraph: The Tanglewood Music Center’s Festival of Contemporary Music offered six programs with a small group of composers who interested this year’s festival director, the composer Oliver Knussen.

headline.seo: At Tanglewood, a Focus on a Group of Composers
headline.main: A Composer Focuses on a Small Group of Colleagues at Tanglewood
headline.print_headline: A Composer Focuses on a Small Group of Colleagues at Tanglewood
